summary: The Keep Our Promise to America’s Children and Teachers Act (Keep Our PACT Act) mandates full funding for Part A of Title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA). It specifies increasing appropriations for these programs through 2035 and beyond, using specific dollar amounts or percentages based on enrollment and per-pupil expenditures. The bill also designates these appropriations as an emergency requirement.
